00106 int lru_entry_to_str( LRU_data_t data, char * str) 
00107 {
00108   cache_entry_t * pentry = NULL ;
00109   
00110   pentry =  (cache_entry_t *)data.pdata ;
00111   
00112   return sprintf( str, "Pentry: Addr %p, state=%d", pentry, pentry->internal_md.valid_state ) ;
00113 } /* lru_entry_to_str */
00114 
00115 int lru_clean_entry( LRU_entry_t * entry, void * adddata) 
00116 {
00117   return 0 ;
00118 } /* lru_clean_entry */

00137   char  localmachine[256] ;

00139   desc_log_stream_t  voie_cache ;

00159   
00160   unsigned int begin_cookie = 0 ;
00161   hash_buffer_t key, value ;
00162   
00163   uid_t uid;
00164   fsal_cred_t cred;
00165

00173   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup = NULL ;
00174   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup2 = NULL ;
00175   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup3 = NULL ;
00176   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_lookup4 = NULL ;

00179   cache_entry_t * cache_entry_dircont = NULL ;

00182   
00183   char * configfile = argv[1] ;
00184   int i = 0 ;
00185   int rc = 0 ;
00186   
00187   /* Init the Buddy System allocation */
00188   if( ( rc = BuddyInit( NULL ) ) != BUDDY_SUCCESS )
00189     {
00190       fprintf( stderr, "Error while Initing the Buddy system allocator"  ) ;
00191       exit( 1 ) ;
00192     }
00193  
00194   /* init debug */
00195   SetNamePgm( "test_cache_inode" ) ;
00196   SetNameFunction( "main" ) ;
00197   SetNameFileLog( "/dev/tty" ) ;
00198 
00199 #if defined( _USE_GHOSTFS )
00200   if( argc != 2 )
00201     {
00202       fprintf( stderr, "Please set the configuration file as parameter\n" ) ;
00203       exit( 1 ) ;
00204     }
00205 #endif  
00206   
00207   /* Obtention du nom de la machine */
00208   if( gethostname( localmachine, sizeof( localmachine ) ) != 0 )
00209     {
00210       DisplayErrorLog( ERR_SYS, ERR_GETHOSTNAME, errno ) ;
00211       exit( 1 ) ;
00212     }
00213   else
00214     SetNameHost( localmachine ) ;
00215   
00216   InitDebug( NIV_FULL_DEBUG ) ;
00217   AddFamilyError( ERR_FSAL, "FSAL related Errors", tab_errstatus_FSAL ) ;  AddFamilyError( ERR_CACHE_INODE, "FSAL related Errors", tab_errstatus_cache_inode ) ;
00218   
00219   /* creating log */
00220   voie_fsal.fd = fileno( stdout ) ;
00221   AddLogStreamJd( &log_desc_fsal, V_FD,voie_fsal,NIV_FULL_DEBUG,SUP);
00222 
00223   voie_cache.fd = fileno( stdout ) ;
00224   AddLogStreamJd( &log_desc_cache, V_FD,voie_cache,NIV_FULL_DEBUG,SUP);
00225   
00226   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Starting the test" ) ;
00227   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "-----------------" ) ;
00228 
00229 #if defined( _USE_GHOSTFS )  
00230   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2path( configfile, 
00231                                              strlen( configfile )+1,
00232                                              &(init_param.fs_specific_info.definition_file ) ) ) )
00233     {
00234       DisplayErrorJd(log_desc_fsal,ERR_FSAL,status.major,status.minor);
00235     }
00236 
00237 #elif defined( _USE_HPSS )
00238  
00239   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, Flags);
00240   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, DebugValue);
00241   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, TransferType);
00242   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, NumRetries);
00243   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, BusyDelay);
00244   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, BusyRetries);
00245   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, TotalDelay);
00246   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, GKTotalDelay);
00247   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, LimitedRetries);
00248   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, MaxConnections);
00249   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, ReuseDataConnections);
00250   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, UsePortRange);
00251   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, RetryStageInp);
00252   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, DMAPWriteUpdates);
00253   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, ServerName);
00254   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_specific_info, DescName);
00255   
00256   init_param.fs_specific_info.behaviors.PrincipalName = FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE;
00257   strncpy(init_param.fs_specific_info.hpss_config.PrincipalName, 
00258           HPSS_SSM, 
00259           HPSS_MAX_PRINCIPAL_NAME);  
00260 
00261   
00262   init_param.fs_specific_info.behaviors.KeytabPath = FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE ;
00263   strncpy(init_param.fs_specific_info.hpss_config.KeytabPath,
00264           HPSS_KEYTAB,
00265           HPSS_MAX_PATH_NAME);

00271 
00272 #endif  
00273   /* 2-common info (default) */
00274   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info,maxfilesize);
00275   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info,maxlink);
00276   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxnamelen);

00278   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, no_trunc);
00279   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, chown_restricted);
00280   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, case_insensitive);
00281   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, case_preserving);
00282   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, fh_expire_type);
00283   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, link_support);
00284   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, symlink_support);  
00285   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, named_attr);
00286   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, unique_handles);
00287   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, lease_time);
00288   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, acl_support);
00289   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, cansettime);
00290   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, homogenous);
00291   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxread);
00292   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( init_param.fs_common_info, maxwrite);
00293   
00294   /* 3- fsal info*/
00295   init_param.fsal_info.log_outputs = log_desc_fsal;
00296   
00297   /* Init */
00298   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_Init( &init_param ) ) )
00299     {
00300       DisplayErrorJd(log_desc_fsal,ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00301     }
00302 
00303    /* getting creds */
00304   uid=getuid(); 
00305   
00306   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_GetUserCred( uid, NULL, &cred ) ) )
00307     {
00308       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00309     }
00310   
00311   /* Init of the cache inode module */
00312   cache_param.hparam.index_size       = 31 ;
00313   cache_param.hparam.alphabet_length  = 10 ; /* Buffer seen as a decimal polynom */
00314   cache_param.hparam.nb_node_prealloc = 100 ;
00315   cache_param.hparam.hash_func_key    = cache_inode_fsal_hash_func ;
00316   cache_param.hparam.hash_func_rbt    = cache_inode_fsal_rbt_func ;
00317   cache_param.hparam.compare_key      = cache_inode_compare_key_fsal ;
00318   cache_param.hparam.key_to_str       = display_key ;
00319   cache_param.hparam.val_to_str       = display_value ;
00320 
00321   if( ( ht = cache_inode_init( cache_param, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00322     {
00323       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error %d while init hash ", cache_status ) ;
00324     }
00325   else
00326     DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Hash Table address = %p", ht ) ;
00327 
00328   /* We need a cache_client to acces the cache */  
00329   cache_client_param.log_outputs = log_desc_cache;
00330   cache_client_param.attrmask = FSAL_ATTRS_MANDATORY|FSAL_ATTR_MTIME|FSAL_ATTR_CTIME|FSAL_ATTR_ATIME  ; 
00331   cache_client_param.nb_prealloc_entry = 1000 ;
00332   cache_client_param.nb_pre_dir_data = 200 ;
00333   cache_client_param.nb_pre_parent = 1200 ;
00334   cache_client_param.nb_pre_state_v4 = 100 ;
00335   
00336   cache_client_param.lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc = 1000 ;
00337   cache_client_param.lru_param.entry_to_str = lru_entry_to_str ;
00338   cache_client_param.lru_param.clean_entry = lru_clean_entry ;
00339 
00340   cache_client_param.grace_period_attr = 0 ; 
00341   cache_client_param.grace_period_link = 0 ; 
00342 
00343   /* Init the cache_inode client */
00344   if( cache_inode_client_init( &client, cache_client_param , 0) != 0 )
00345     exit( 1 ) ;
00346 
00347   /* Getting the root of the FS */
00348   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2path( "/", 2, &pathroot) )) )
00349     {
00350       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00351       exit( 1 ) ;
00352     }
00353   
00354   attribs.asked_attributes = cache_client_param.attrmask ;
00355   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_lookupPath( pathroot, &cred, &root_handle, &attribs ) ) ) )
00356     {
00357       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00358       exit( 1 ) ;
00359     }
00360   fsdata.cookie = 0 ;
00361   fsdata.handle = root_handle ;
00362   
00363   /* Cache the root of the FS */
00364   if( ( cache_entry_root = cache_inode_make_root( &fsdata, 1, ht, &client, &cred, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00365     {
00366       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't init fs's root" ) ;
00367       exit( 1 ) ;
00368     }
00369 
00370   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00371   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "cea", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00372     {
00373       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00374       exit( 1 ) ;
00375     }
00376 
00377   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00378                                                  name, 
00379                                                  &attrlookup, 
00380                                                  ht, 
00381                                                  &client, 
00382                                                  &cred, 
00383                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00384     {
00385       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00386       exit( 1 ) ;
00387     }
00388 
00389   /* Lookup a second time (entry should now be cached) */
00390   if( ( cache_entry_lookup2 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00391                                                   name, 
00392                                                   &attrlookup, 
00393                                                   ht, 
00394                                                   &client, 
00395                                                   &cred, 
00396                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00397     {
00398       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_fsal, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00399       exit( 1 ) ;
00400     }
00401  
00402   if( cache_entry_lookup2 != cache_entry_lookup ) 
00403     {
00404       printf( "Error: lookup results should be the same\n" ) ;
00405       exit( 1 ) ;
00406     }
00407   
00408    /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00409   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "log", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00410     {
00411       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00412       exit( 1 ) ;
00413     }
00414 
00415   if( ( cache_entry_lookup3 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00416                                                   name, 
00417                                                   &attrlookup, 
00418                                                   ht, 
00419                                                   &client, 
00420                                                   &cred, 
00421                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00422     {
00423       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00424       exit( 1 ) ;
00425     }
00426   
00427   if( ( cache_entry_lookup4 = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00428                                                   name, 
00429                                                   &attrlookup, 
00430                                                   ht, 
00431                                                   &client, 
00432                                                   &cred, 
00433                                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00434     {
00435       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00436       exit( 1 ) ;
00437     }
00438 
00439   if( cache_entry_lookup3 != cache_entry_lookup4 ) 
00440     {
00441       printf( "Error: lookup results should be the same\n" ) ;
00442       exit( 1 ) ;
00443     }
00444   
00445   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00446   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "cea", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00447     {
00448       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00449       exit( 1 ) ;
00450     }
00451   
00452   
00453   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00454                                                  name, 
00455                                                  &attrlookup, 
00456                                                  ht, 
00457                                                  &client, 
00458                                                  &cred, 
00459                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00460     {
00461       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00462       exit( 1 ) ;
00463     }
00464 
00465   /* A lookup in the root fsal */
00466   if( (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = FSAL_str2name( "log", 10, &name )  ) ) )
00467     {
00468       DisplayErrorJd( log_desc_fsal, ERR_FSAL, status.major, status.minor);
00469       exit( 1 ) ;
00470     }
00471 
00472   if( ( cache_entry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_root, 
00473                                                  name, 
00474                                                  &attrlookup, 
00475                                                  ht, 
00476                                                  &client, 
00477                                                  &cred, 
00478                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00479     {
00480       DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "Error: can't lookup" ) ;
00481       exit( 1 ) ;
00482     }
00483   
00484   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "---------------------------------" ) ;
00485   
00486   /* The end of all the tests */
00487   DisplayLogJd( log_desc_cache, "All tests exited successfully" ) ;
00488   
00489   exit( 0 ) ;
00490 } /* main */
